participant_1.background: i like donuts. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. my favorite band is the insane clown posse.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Determined and introspective, with a hint of rebelliousness.
participant_2.background: i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind.

content.text: I want to tell you something about me. I like to listen to insane clown posse
